source.query:
SELECT
 "0DOC_NUMBER" AS Sales_Document,
 "0S_ORD_ITEM" AS Sales_Document_Item,
 "0SOLD_TO" AS Sold_To_Party,
 "0DOC_CATEG" AS Sales_Document_Category,
 "0SALESORG" AS Sales_Organisation,
 "0DISTR_CHAN" AS Distribution_Channel,
 "0EANUPC" AS EAN_Code,
 "0PLANT" AS Plant,
 "0MATERIAL" AS Material,
 "0MATERIAL__0MATL_TYPE" AS Material_Type,
 "0BILLTOPRTY" AS Bill_To_Party,
 "0PAYER" AS Payer,
 "0SHIP_TO" AS Ship_To_Party ,
 "0DOC_TYPE" AS Sales_Document_Type,
 "Z_DECOMP" AS Decomposition_Indicator,
 "Z_VDATU" AS Requested_Delivery_Date,
  "0BASE_UOM" AS Base_Unit_of_Measure,
 "0MAT_SALES" AS Material_In_Sales_Area,
 "0MAT_SALES__ZZLMATGP" AS Local_Material_Group,
 "0CUST_SALES" AS Customer_Sales_View,
 "0CUST_SALES__0SALESEMPLY" AS Sales_Rep,
 "0CUST_SALES__ZCUS_LEV1" AS Customer_Hierarchy_Level_1,
 "0CUST_SALES__ZCUS_LVL2" AS Customer_Hierarchy_Level_2,
 "0CUST_SALES__ZCUS_LVL3" AS Customer_Hierarchy_Level_3,
 "0CUST_SALES__ZCUS_LVL4" AS Customer_Hierarchy_Level_4,
 "0CUST_SALES__ZCUS_LVL5" AS Customer_Hierarchy_Level_5,
 "0CUST_SALES__ZCUS_LVL6" AS Customer_Hierarchy_Level_6,
 "0CUST_SALES__Z_SLSEMPA" AS Alternative_Sales_Rep,
 "0DIVISION" AS Division,
 "0CUST_GRP5" AS Customer_Group_5, 
 "ZPFR_SDOC" AS Sales_Document_PFR,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__0CALDAY" AS PFR_Date,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__0CALMONTH" AS PFR_Month,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__0CALWEEK" AS PFR_Week,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__0DOC_DATE" AS PFR_0DOC_DATE,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__0PO_NUMBER" AS Customer_PO,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__0REASON_REJ" AS Rejection_Reason_Derived,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__ZCALMONTH" AS First_Shipped_Month,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__ZCALWEEK" AS First_Shipped_Week,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__ZGBSTK" AS Overall_Processing_Status,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__ZPFR_OSHP" AS Order_Shipped_Any_Line,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__Z_ABSTK" AS Rejection_Status,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__Z_FKSAK" AS Billing_Status_Order_Related,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__Z_LFSTK" AS Delivery_Status,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__Z_PACTSDT" AS Actual_Ship_Date,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__Z_PFR1" AS Relevant_To_PFR1,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__Z_PFR2_CP" AS Relevant_To_PFR2_CP,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__Z_PFR2_PO" AS Relevant_To_PFR2_PO,
 "ZPFR_SDOC__Z_PLINTYP" AS PFR_Line_Type,
 "0MAT_SALES__ZLOBCNTRY" AS Country,
 "0MAT_SALES__ZAREA" AS Area,
 "0MAT_SALES__ZMARKET" AS Market,
 "0MAT_SALES__ZREGION" AS Region,
 "0MAT_PLANT" AS Material_In_Plant,
 "0MAT_PLANT__Z_PSFPDSC" AS Primary_Supply_Factory_Name,
 "0MAT_PLANT__Z_PSFSDSC" AS Secondary_Supply_Factory_Name,
 "0MAT_PLANT__Z_PSUPFCP" AS Primary_Supply_Factory,
 "0MAT_PLANT__Z_PSUPFCS" AS Secondary_Supply_Factory,
 "0MAT_PLANT__Z_SUPL_P" AS Primary_Supplying_Plant,
 "0MAT_PLANT__Z_SUPL_S" AS Secondary_Supply_Plant,
 "0CURRENCY" AS Currency_key,
 "Z_NS_GS_CURRENCY" AS CURRENCY_Not_Shipped_Gross_Sales_Value,
 "Z_NS_NIS_CURRENCY" AS CURRENCY_Not_Shipped_Net_Value,
 "0NET_VALUE_CURRENCY" AS CURRECY_Net_value_order_item_doc_curr,
 "0SUBTOTAL_1_CURRENCY" AS CURRENCY_Condition_Subtotal_1,
"ZPFR_SDOC__0CANC_DATE" AS Cancellation_Date,
"Z_WBSTA" AS Goods_Movement_Status,
"Z_GRUND" AS Reason_For_POD_Variance,
"Z_CALCU" AS Quantity_Calculation_For_POD,
"0MATERIAL__Z_PSKUCD" AS CSR_Material_Text,   -- added this column for material text after QA move
--"0MATERIAL__Z_PITMNO2" AS CSR_Material, -- removed and replaced with 0Material
"0MATERIAL" AS CSR_Material,
--"0MATERIAL__Z_PITMNO2" AS CSR_Material,
"0MATERIAL__ZBRAND" AS Brand,
"0MATERIAL__ZSEGMENT" AS Segment,
"0MATERIAL__Z_PSECTOR" AS CSR_Sector,
"0MATERIAL__Z_PPRDFRM" AS CSR_Product_Form,
"0MATERIAL__Z_PCATGRY" AS Category,
"0MATERIAL__Z_PVARNT" AS Variant,
"0CUST_SALES__Z_PLAN_TO" AS Plan_to_Party,
"0CUST_SALES__Z_PINTACC" AS CSR_International_Account,
"0CUST_SALES__Z_PLANTOD" AS PFR_Plan_to_Name,
"ZPFR_SDOC__Z_PRCGLBL" AS Global_Reason_Code,
"0CUST_SALES__Z_PLAN_TO_description" AS Plan_to_Party_Description,
"0BILLTOPRTY_description" AS Bill_To_Party_Description,
--"0SHIP_TO_description" AS Ship_To_Party_Description,
NULL AS Ship_To_Party_Description,
"0MATERIAL__ZBRAND_description" AS Brand_Description,
"0MATERIAL__0MATL_TYPE_description" AS Material_Type_Description,
"0MATERIAL__Z_PCATGRY_description" AS Category_Description,
"0MATERIAL__Z_PSEGMNT_description" AS Segment_Description,
--"0MATERIAL__ZVARIANT_description" AS Variant_Description,
NULL AS Variant_Description,
--"0CURRENCY_description" AS Currency_key_Description,             -- causing issue and hence replaced with "0CURRENCY"
"0CURRENCY" AS Currency_key_Description,
"ZPFR_SDOC__Z_PRCGLBL_description" AS Global_Reason_Code_Description,
"ZPFR_SDOC__0REASON_REJ_description" AS Rejection_Reason_Derived_Description,
"0MAT_SALES__ZLOBCNTRY_description" AS Country_Description,
"0MAT_SALES__ZAREA_description" AS Area_Description,
"0MAT_SALES__ZREGION_description" AS Region_Description,
"SAP_PFR1_Ordered_Qty" AS SAP_PFR1_Ordered_Qty,
"SAP_PFR2_CP_Ordered_Qty" AS SAP_PFR2_CP_Ordered_Qty,
"SAP_PFR2_PO_Ordered_Qty" AS SAP_PFR2_PO_Ordered_Qty,
"SAP_PFR1_Open_Qty" AS SAP_PFR1_Open_Qty,
"SAP_PFR2_CP_Open_Qty" AS SAP_PFR2_CP_Open_Qty,
"SAP_PFR2_PO_Open_Qty" AS SAP_PFR2_PO_Open_Qty,
"SAP_PFR1_Cancelled_Qty" AS SAP_PFR1_Cancelled_Qty,
"SAP_PFR2_CP_Cancelled_Qty" AS SAP_PFR2_CP_Cancelled_Qty,
"SAP_PFR2_PO_Cancelled_Qty" AS SAP_PFR2_PO_Cancelled_Qty,
"Z_NS_GS" AS Not_Shipped_Gross_Sales_Value,
"Z_NS_NIS" AS Not_Shipped_Net_Value,
"Z_NS_QTY" AS Not_Shipped_Quantity_in_base_unit,
 "0QUANT_B" AS Quantity_In_Base_UOM,
 "0NET_VALUE" AS Net_value_order_item_doc_curr,
 "0SUBTOTAL_1" AS Condition_Subtotal_1,
 "0NO_POS" AS Counter_For_Items,
"0ACT_DL_QTY" AS Delivery_Quantity_base_unit,
"SAP_Cancelled_QTY" AS SAP_Cancelled_QTY,
"SAP_Shipped_Qty" AS SAP_Shipped_Qty,
"SAP_Ordered_Qty" AS SAP_Ordered_Qty,
"PFR_WK_RKF_BACK_QTY" AS SAP_Backordered_Qty,
"PFR_WK_RKF_OPEN_QTY" AS SAP_Open_Qty,
"SAP_Extended_Price" AS SAP_Extended_Price
FROM "_SYS_BIC"."CSR.SAP_PFR/CV_ZMKP" 
WHERE 
"0MAT_SALES__ZELOB" = 'HEA' AND
"ZPFR_SDOC__0CALWEEK" >= 201701
